sentences.english: By exposing under different light filters, photographs with different image contrast can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 曝光時使用不同濾色鏡即可獲得影像反差不同的照片。

sentences.english: Filter selection is made using inherent spectra .
sentences.chinese: 濾色鏡的選擇必須利用固有光譜。

sentences.english: Adding color filters over them reduces the light going into the display.
sentences.chinese: 在上方添加濾色鏡可能會削弱進入屏幕的光線。
